mapper.sql: wu.warningId as warningId, u.userName as userName, wu.longitude as longitude, wu.latitude as latitude,wu.behavior as behavior,wu.receiveTime as receiveTime, wu.source as source
id, receiveTime, address, userId, longitude, latitude, behavior, remarks, source, warningId
mapper.insert: insert into WarningUntreated (id, receiveTime, address, userId, longitude, latitude, behavior, remarks, source, warningId) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{warningid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update WarningUntreated
receiveTime = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
behavior = #{behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},
warningId = #{warningid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WarningUntreated set receiveTime = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, behavior = #{behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT}, warningId = #{warningid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from WarningUntreated wu,NurseUser nu,User u where nu.nurseId = #{id} and nu.userId=wu.userId and wu.userId=u.id

select
from WarningUntreated wu,UserFriend uf,User u where uf.userId = #{id} and uf.friendId=wu.userId and wu.userId=u.id
